title: Ticket #3005: Proper builds requiring cmake 2.8
description:
Several users have reported failures when doing proper builds using cmake 2.6. Using cmake 2.8 instead fixes the problem. In the cmake files, we declare that proper builds require cmake 2.6 and non-proper builds require cmake 2.8.

We need cmake 2.8 for building the externals, but there shouldn't be anything requiring 2.8 otherwise. I found two places where we rely on 2.8 features, which can be rewritten to work with 2.6.
check_ins: 2012-May-21 17:29   Check-in [32083]: Remove reliance on cmake 2.8 features in proper builds. #3005 We should only require cmake 2.8 for building the externals (aka non-proper builds). Fix two instances where we relied on cmake 2.8 features in a proper build. ===VersionHistory:None=== (By Jaime Frey )
